=== Ubuntu Governance ===
==== Community Council ====
* Refined <nowiki>[[Membership]]</nowiki> document.
* CC meeting, 2009-12-15: discussed the future of sounder@ (and ubuntu-users@), proposal which is going to be discussed by the CC is to 
** set up guidelines for moderation if threads get out of hand or individiual users decide not to pay attention to requests for a more appropriate tone
** discuss with the broader community
** call for moderators for sounder@, if we don't get enough, we consider closing the list
** we'll consider other lists for moderation if necessary

=== Ubuntu Women Team ===

* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Interviews|Interviews Series]]</nowiki> for Full Circle Magazine published <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-32/|Issue 32]]</nowiki> with interview of Emma Jane Hogbin
* Relaunch of the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Resources|/Resources]]</nowiki> revival <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2009-December/002324.html]]</nowiki>
* Launched <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2009-December/002310.html|call for leadership]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2009-December/002340.html|call for testimonials on potential leaders]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UbuntuWomen/LeadershipNominations/January2010/melissa|Melissa Draper]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UbuntuWomen/LeadershipNominations/January2010/Amber|Amber Graner]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/UbuntuWomen/LeadershipNominations/January2010/Penelope|Penelope Stowe]]</nowiki>
* Held team meeting on 9 Dec 2009, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20091209|Minutes, Log]]</nowiki>
